action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex
sudo su - postgres bash -c "psql -c \"CREATE USER rep REPLICATION LOGIN ENCRYPTED PASSWORD '@@{DB_PASSWORD}@@';\" "

if [ "@@{PROFILE}@@" = "AHV" ]
then
    pg_slaves=$(echo @@{AHVSlave.address}@@ | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n")
elif [ "@@{PROFILE}@@" = "AWS" ]
then
    pg_slaves=$(echo @@{AWSSlave.address}@@ | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n")
fi

for slave in ${pg_slaves} 
do
  echo "host    replication     rep     ${slave}/32     md5" | sudo tee -a /var/lib/pgsql/9.5/data/pg_hba.conf
done

echo "listen_addresses = '*'
wal_level = 'hot_standby'
archive_mode = on
archive_command = 'cd .'
max_wal_senders = 3
hot_standby = on
wal_keep_segments = 8" | sudo tee -a /var/lib/pgsql/9.5/data/postgresql.conf 

sudo systemctl restart postgresql-9.5

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex
sudo systemctl stop postgresql-9.5
sleep 60

if [ "@@{PROFILE}@@" = "AHV" ]
then
    Master_IP=@@{AHVMaster.address}@@
elif [ "@@{PROFILE}@@" = "AWS" ]
then
    Master_IP=@@{AWSMaster.address}@@
fi

sudo su - postgres <<EOF
  mv 9.5/data 9.5/data.org
  echo "${Master_IP}:5432:*:rep:@@{DB_PASSWORD}@@" > ~/.pgpass
  chmod 0600 ~/.pgpass
  pg_basebackup -h ${Master_IP} -D /var/lib/pgsql/9.5/data -U rep -v -P
EOF

sleep 2
sudo sed -i -e 's/ExecStart=.*/ExecStart=\/usr\/pgsql-9\.5\/bin\/pg_ctl start -D ${PGDATA} -s -W -t 300/g' /usr/lib/systemd/system/postgresql-9.5.service

echo "host    replication     rep     ${Master_IP}/32     md5" | sudo tee -a /var/lib/pgsql/9.5/data/pg_hba.conf
echo "listen_addresses = '*'
wal_level = 'hot_standby'
archive_mode = on
archive_command = 'cd .'
max_wal_senders = 3
hot_standby = on
wal_keep_segments = 8" | sudo tee -a /var/lib/pgsql/9.5/data/postgresql.conf

sudo su - postgres sh -c "touch 9.5/data/recovery.conf"

echo "standby_mode = 'on'
primary_conninfo = 'host=${Master_IP} port=5432 user=rep password=@@{DB_PASSWORD}@@'
trigger_file = '/tmp/postgresql.trigger.5432'" | sudo tee -a /var/lib/pgsql/9.5/data/recovery.conf

sudo systemctl start postgresql-9.5

action_list.description:
Take DB backup. 
DB_NAME : Name of DB to be backup
BACKUP_FILE_PATH : Absolute directory path for backup file
action_list.name: Backup

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash

db_name="@@{DB_NAME}@@"
backup_file_path="@@{BACKUP_FILE_PATH}@@"

sudo su - postgres bash -c "pg_dump ${db_name} | gzip > ${backup_file_path}"

action_list.description:
Restore DB from dump file
DB_NAME : Name of DB to be backup
RESTORE_FILE_PATH : Absolute directory path for restore file
action_list.name: Restore

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash

db_name="@@{DB_NAME}@@"
restore_file_path="@@{RESTORE_FILE_PATH}@@"

sudo su - postgres bash -c "gunzip -c ${restore_file_path} | psql ${db_name}"

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo yum install -y https://download.postgresql.org/pub/repos/yum/9.5/redhat/rhel-7-x86_64/pgdg-centos95-9.5-3.noarch.rpm
sudo yum update -y
sudo yum install -y postgresql95 postgresql95-server postgresql95-contrib
sudo /usr/pgsql-9.5/bin/postgresql95-setup initdb
sudo systemctl enable postgresql-9.5
sudo systemctl start postgresql-9.5
sudo setenforce 0
echo "Done"
#!/bin/bash

action_list.description: System action for creating an application

sudo su - postgres bash -c "psql -c \"CREATE USER rep REPLICATION LOGIN ENCRYPTED PASSWORD '@@{DB_PASSWORD}@@';\" "

if [ "@@{PROFILE}@@" = "AHV" ]
then
    pg_slaves=$(echo @@{AHVSlave.address}@@ | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n")

for slave in ${pg_slaves} 
do
  echo "host    replication     rep     ${slave}/32     md5" | sudo tee -a /var/lib/pgsql/9.5/data/pg_hba.conf
done

echo "listen_addresses = '*'
wal_level = 'hot_standby'
archive_mode = on
archive_command = 'cd .'
max_wal_senders = 3
hot_standby = on
wal_keep_segments = 8" | sudo tee -a /var/lib/pgsql/9.5/data/postgresql.conf 

sudo systemctl restart postgresql-9.5

if [ "@@{PROFILE}@@" = "AHV" ]
then
    Master_IP=@@{AHVMaster.address}@@
elif [ "@@{PROFILE}@@" = "AWS" ]
then

sudo su - postgres <<EOF
  mv 9.5/data 9.5/data.org
  echo "${Master_IP}:5432:*:rep:@@{DB_PASSWORD}@@" > ~/.pgpass
  chmod 0600 ~/.pgpass
  pg_basebackup -h ${Master_IP} -D /var/lib/pgsql/9.5/data -U rep -v -P
EOF

sleep 2
sudo sed -i -e 's/ExecStart=.*/ExecStart=\/usr\/pgsql-9\.5\/bin\/pg_ctl start -D ${PGDATA} -s -W -t 300/g' /usr/lib/systemd/system/postgresql-9.5.service

echo "host    replication     rep     ${Master_IP}/32     md5" | sudo tee -a /var/lib/pgsql/9.5/data/pg_hba.conf
echo "listen_addresses = '*'
wal_level = 'hot_standby'
archive_mode = on
archive_command = 'cd .'
max_wal_senders = 3
hot_standby = on
wal_keep_segments = 8" | sudo tee -a /var/lib/pgsql/9.5/data/postgresql.conf

sudo su - postgres sh -c "touch 9.5/data/recovery.conf"

echo "standby_mode = 'on'
primary_conninfo = 'host=${Master_IP} port=5432 user=rep password=@@{DB_PASSWORD}@@'
trigger_file = '/tmp/postgresql.trigger.5432'" | sudo tee -a /var/lib/pgsql/9.5/data/recovery.conf

sudo systemctl start postgresql-9.5

action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Deletes created VMs as well
action_list.name: action_delete

action_list.description: System action for starting an application
action_list.name: action_start

action_list.description: System action for stopping an application
action_list.name: action_stop

action_list.description: System action for restarting an application
action_list.name: action_restart

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
users:
  - name: centos
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{INSTANCE_PUBLIC_KEY}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']

#cloud-config
users:
  - name: centos
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{INSTANCE_PUBLIC_KEY}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo yum install -y https://download.postgresql.org/pub/repos/yum/9.5/redhat/rhel-7-x86_64/pgdg-centos95-9.5-3.noarch.rpm
sudo yum update -y
sudo yum install -y postgresql95 postgresql95-server postgresql95-contrib
sudo /usr/pgsql-9.5/bin/postgresql95-setup initdb
sudo systemctl enable postgresql-9.5
sudo systemctl start postgresql-9.5
sudo setenforce 0
echo "Done"

action_list.description:
Take DB backup. 
DB_NAME : Name of DB to be backup
BACKUP_FILE_PATH : Absolute directory path for backup file

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash

db_name="@@{DB_NAME}@@"
backup_file_path="@@{BACKUP_FILE_PATH}@@"

sudo su - postgres bash -c "pg_dump ${db_name} | gzip > ${backup_file_path}"

action_list.name: Backup

action_list.description:
Restore DB from dump file
DB_NAME : Name of DB to be backup
RESTORE_FILE_PATH : Absolute directory path for restore file

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash

db_name="@@{DB_NAME}@@"
restore_file_path="@@{RESTORE_FILE_PATH}@@"

sudo su - postgres bash -c "gunzip -c ${restore_file_path} | psql ${db_name}"

action_list.name: Restore
